title: Honkytonk Films
text:
Honkytonk Films is a <a href="new%20media">new media</a> production company based in Paris, France.
Founded in 2007 by Arnaud Dressen and Benoit de Vilmorin, the company develops, produces and distributes <a href="multimedia">multimedia</a> documentaries on all platforms (TV, Internet and mobile) worldwide.
Since 2008, Honkytonk has realized co-productions of <a href="Web%20documentary">web-documentaries</a> such as "<a href="Journey%20to%20the%20End%20of%20Coal">Journey to the End of Coal</a>", that received <a href="Civil%20Society%20of%20Multimedia%20Authors">SCAM</a> award of the <a href="multimedia">multimedia</a> work in 2009.
The company is also dedicated to developing and distributing <a href="Klynt">Klynt</a>, an application dedicated to interactive editing.
Research and development: Klynt.
Klynt is an application dedicated to new media content producers. It was developed to create interactive <a href="Interactive%20media">rich media</a> stories on Internet.
It includes:
 Examples of projects produced using Klynt: 
 - "Journey to the End of Coal"
 - "The Big Issue"
